name: School of Transmutation
description: Transmuters study spells that alter energy and matter, seeing the world as mutable and ever-changing. They wield the raw stuff of creation, capable of both creating and destroying with their transformative magic.

transmutation_savant.description: At 2nd level, the gold and time required to copy a Transmutation spell into your spellbook is halved.
benefits: Halve the cost and time to copy Transmutation spells into your spellbook.

minor_alchemy.description: Starting at 2nd level, you can alter the physical properties of non-magical objects, changing them from one material to another. This effect lasts for 1 hour or until you lose concentration.
details: Transform non-magical wood, stone (not gemstones), iron, copper, or silver into another material of the same group.
Transform up to 1 cubic foot of material per 10 minutes.
Reverts to original material after 1 hour or if concentration is lost.

transmuters_stone.description: At 6th level, you can create a transmuter's stone with one of several benefits. The stone can be used by you or given to another creature and can be changed each time you cast a transmutation spell.
benefits: Resistance to a type of damage (acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder).
details: Create a transmuter's stone with chosen benefit after 8 hours of work.
Change the stone's effect whenever you cast a transmutation spell.
Previous stones become non-functional if a new one is created.

shapechanger.description: At 10th level, you add the Polymorph spell to your spellbook. You can cast Polymorph without expending a spell slot, but only on yourself to turn into a beast with a challenge rating of 1 or lower.
benefits: Cast Polymorph on yourself without using a spell slot.
Transform into a beast with a challenge rating of 1 or lower.
details: Can’t use this feature again until you finish a short or long rest.

master_transmuter.description: At 14th level, you can consume the magic stored in your transmuter's stone to perform one of several powerful effects. The stone is destroyed and cannot be recreated until after a long rest.
effects: Major Transformation: Transmute a non-magical object (5-foot cube) into another of similar size and mass.
Panacea: Remove all curses, diseases, and poisons from a creature and restore its hit points.
Restore Life: Cast Raise Dead on a creature without using a spell slot.
Restore Youth: Reduce a creature’s apparent age by 3d10 years (minimum 13 years).
details: The transmuter's stone is destroyed and cannot be remade until you finish a long rest.
